node.excerpt: “BikePoint” wayfinding is an innovative system of wayfinding in widespread use in Western Europe, but practically unknown and unheard of in the United States. A BikePoint wayfinding system is made of many “bike points,” which are of numbered intersections connected by well-labeled bike-friendly…

frontmatter.title: Closing The BikePoints Project
frontmatter.description: Ending my work on the BikePoints project.

node.excerpt: by Albert Carter and Alex Crompton. Update, November 4, 2020: a BikePoints website is now live. Update, October 15, 2020: The City of Cambridge, MA is showing some interest in this, since it fits well into the Cambridge 2020 Bicycle Plan. If you’re also interested in this, please encourage them to…

frontmatter.title: A Dutch Import We Can All Love: Bike Points
frontmatter.description: They're cheap, politically easy, and improve people's lives. Find out what they are, how to make them, and how to bring them to the US.
